name: Sandshrew

evolution.description: Sandshrew can evolve into Sandslash at level 7 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 10 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Mouse Pokémon. Its body is dry. When it gets cold at night, its hide is said to become coated with a fine dew.

abilities.name: Sand Veil
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to Sandstorm damage. In addition, its AC increases by 2 in desert terrain, or during a Sandstorm.

abilities.name: Sand Rush
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to Sandstorm damage, and its speed is doubled in desert terrain, or during a Sandstorm.
